forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 13C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies this morning will become partly cloudy this afternoon. High 56F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 8C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this evening, becoming a steady rain overnight. Low 46F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional light rain. High near 10C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. High near 50F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 8C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 46F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High near 10C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 49F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain...mixing with snow late. Low 2C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain with some snow mixing in late. Low around 35F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers becoming mixed with rain later. High 3C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers that will mix with rain showers later. High 38F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low around -5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 23F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine. High -1C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 31F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low around -5C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 23F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 36F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low -2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 28F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 37F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 26F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy early with showers developing later in the day. High 2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy early with showers developing later in the day. High 36F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low 32F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 38F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low around -0C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 32F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low around 0C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 32F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
